item.title: South Korea's president faces calls to resign or be impeached
item.description: Opposition parties have filed a motion to impeach President Yoon Suk Yeol and plans for rallies in major cities are underway.

item.title: D.R. Congo's mining capital is at the heart of Biden's bid to counter China in Africa
item.description: Kolwezi has some of the world's largest copper and cobalt reserves and that makes it a key location at the heart of the U.S. and China's jostle for mi...

item.title: Supreme Court hears challenge to law banning gender-affirming care for trans kids
item.description: At issue is a Tennessee law that bans access to hormones, puberty blockers, and other treatments for trans kids in the state.

item.title: 'Guardian' journalists strike to protest sale of sister paper 'Observer'
